body_html: @cancan101 I haven't benchmarked but I believe that the transform overhead is minimal. cudnnTransformTensor should be having a very high throughput. I like #8287 though, especially in inference time when you have a small batch (and computation becomes much quicker). For training the overhead is negligible like @zheng-xq said.
